Network traffic patterns consistent with.Action: Monitor Zeek http.log and conn.log for high-volume or unusual outbound traffic to common web services (Dropbox, Google Drive, etc.). Use descriptive statistics and IQR analysis on data volume and connection frequency per user/host to identify outliers indicative of exfiltration or high-frequency C2 communications disguised as normal web traffic.

Attempts to access internal resources us.Data: Windows Event ID 4624, Windows Event ID 4625, Zeek conn.log
Attempts to access internal resources us.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4624 and 4625 for login attempts. Correlate source IPs and account names with threat intelligence feeds or internal lists of potentially compromised accounts/IPs identified from external web service breaches. Use correlation analysis to identify patterns of failed/successful logins from suspicious sources or using suspicious accounts.
